The {{lang|'''Kujou Clan'''|ja=九条家|ja_rm=Kujou-ke}} is a clan that serves the [[Raiden Shogun]], heading the [[Tenryou Commission]]. The clan includes branch families, such as the [[Takatsukasa Clan|Takatsukasa]]. They are generally regarded as the most loyal and powerful of the major families supporting the Shogun's rule.

Their estate is situated directly adjacent to the imperial palace of [[Tenshukaku]].

==Known Members==
===Historically===
* [[Shigeyori Kujou]] (Clan's Namesake)
* [[Kujou Michizane]] (author of [[Sangonomiya Chronicles]])

===Present===
* [[Kujou Takayuki]] &mdash; Tenryou Commissioner (Former Clan Head)
** [[Kujou Masahito]]
** [[Kujou Kamaji]] &mdash; Proxy Clan Head (Acting Clan Head)
** [[Kujou Sara]] (adopted)

==Staff==
*[[Ikeda Soushirou]] (Retainer)
*[[Ippei]] (Kujou Kamaji's servant)

==Trivia==
* The clan is most likely inspired by the {{w|Kujō family|Kujou Family}}, one of the five noblest aristocratic families in Japan. During the ancient and feudal periods of Japan (from the 9th to the 19th centuries), except a few rare cases, only the heads of these five families were conventionally entitled to be the regent and chief advisor of an emperor.
